original_text:
Hit it Hard
Hit It Hard, slot prodotta dalla software house ELK e lanciata a gennaio ’20, è un mix molto ben riuscito tra modernità e stile decisamente vintage, oltre che essere un tecnologico tributo alle mitiche Fruit Machine!
A una prima occhiata il look di questa slot machine ci porta immediatamente indietro agli anni ’90: la schermata di gioco è un tripudio di luci al neon nelle tonalità del fucsia e del viola e anche la grafica così asciutta e lineare è coerente col tema vintage.
Anche se si dà uno sguardo ai rulli la sensazione è quella di essere entrati in una sala da gioco di fine millennio, con simboli presi in prestito dalle tradizionali Fruit Machine tanto care agli appassionati dei giochi di slot.
Ad accompagnare i giocatori mentre girano i rulli c’è poi una colonna sonora a tema che rende l’esperienza di gioco ancora più gradevole e coinvolgente.
Range di scommessa, vincita massima e RTP
Dalla struttura di gioco abbastanza classica, con tre rulli e cinque linee di pagamento, questa slot machine di casa ELK si presenta con funzionalità, pagamenti e possibilità di vincita non stellari ma tutto sommato nella media.
Hit It Hard è una slot machine adattabile alle esigenze della maggior parte dei giocatori anche in virtù del range di scommesse molto elastico: si parte infatti da una scommessa minima di soli 20 centesimi a giro per arrivare alla discreta somma di 100 € come scommessa massima.
Anche le vincite potenziali non solo male: Hit It Hard è caratterizzata da una volatilità medio-alta (4/5), il che significa che sebbene le vincite non siano frequentissime, qualitativamente si possono attendere premi di un certo peso. La vincita massima che si può ottenere giocando con questa slot machine è pari a 2.500 volte il valore della puntata, decisamente non male!
Per quanto riguarda il ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP), questo si attesta su un 96,3 % abbastanza standard, in linea con quello della maggior parte dei giochi di slot che si possono trovare online.
Simboli regolari e speciali e Bonus
I simboli di Hit It Hard, come già detto, si rifanno alla tradizione delle classiche Fruit Machine e comprendono pertanto i simboli che si possono trovare anche nelle slot terrestri.
Tra questi abbiamo il numero 7 presente in tre colori: il 7 verde paga fino a un massimo di 10 volte la puntata, il 7 blu fino a 25 e quello rosso fino a 50 volte quando compare su tutti i rulli.
Il BAR è anch’esso presente negli stessi tre colori del 7, con pagamenti che vanno da 3 a 5 volte la puntata.
I simboli regolari che hanno valore minore sono rappresentati da tre frutti: il cocomero, il limone e la ciliegia, che hanno valore compreso tra 0,5 e 1,5 volte la puntata.
Sono presenti anche un simbolo Wild e uno Scatter, e c’è inoltre la possibilità di giocare un gioco bonus che permette di vincere diversi premi tra cui moltiplicatori e Free Spins, Wild Spins, Stacked Wilds e altri.

raw_translation.response:
Hit it Hard is an online slot game produced by the software company ELK, launched in January 2020. It is a well-executed mix of modernity and vintage style and a technological tribute to the mythical Fruit Machine!

At first glance, the look of this slot machine immediately takes us back to the 90s: the game screen is an explosion of neon lights in shades of fuchsia and purple, and the graphics are also appropriately vintage.

Even if you take a look at the reels, the feeling is that you have entered a late millennium game room, with symbols borrowed from traditional Fruit Machines beloved by slot game enthusiasts. A theme soundtrack accompanies players as they spin the reels, making the gaming experience even more enjoyable and engaging.

Regarding the betting range, maximum payout, and RTP, Hit it Hard has a fairly classic game structure, with three reels and five pay lines. Its features, payouts, and winning possibilities are nothing stellar but are decently average. Hit it Hard is a slot game that can adapt to the needs of most players, thanks to its very flexible betting range, starting from a minimum bet of only 20 cents per spin, up to a reasonable bet of 100 € per maximum spin.

Even potential wins are not too bad: Hit It Hard is characterized by a medium-high volatility (4/5), which means that although the wins are not very frequent, they are of some weight. The maximum payout that players can get playing with this slot machine is 2,500 times the bet value, which is quite impressive! As for the theoretical return to the player (RTP), this is 96.3%, fairly standard, in line with most online slot games.

Hit It Hard symbols include regular and special symbols and Bonus features, as mentioned, referring to the tradition of classic Fruit Machines and including symbols that can also be found in land-based slots.

These include the number 7 in three colors: the green 7 pays up to a maximum of 10 times the bet, the blue 7 up to 25, and the red 7 up to 50 times when it appears on all reels. The BAR is also present in the same three colors as the 7, with payments ranging from 3 to 5 times the bet.

The regular symbols with lower value are represented by three fruits, watermelon, lemon, and cherry, with a value ranging from 0.5 to 1.5 times the bet. There are also a Wild symbol and a Scatter symbol, and the possibility of playing a bonus game that allows winning various prizes, including multipliers and free spins, wild spins, stacked wilds, and more.

Overall, Hit it Hard is a slot game that combines modernity and vintage style, providing an engaging gaming experience to any online gambler with decent payouts and a range of exciting features.

Gameplay Features and Special Symbols

Hit it Hard is a game that offers three reels and five pay lines, with decent payouts and winning possibilities. The symbols include regular and special ones, along with bonus features that pay tribute to the tradition of classic Fruit Machines. Such features include multipliers, free spins, wild spins, and stacked wilds. The special symbols of the game are a Wild and a Scatter symbol, which can help increase the payout. 

Betting Range and Maximum Payout

Hit it Hard offers a betting range that is pretty flexible and can accommodate the needs of most players. The minimum bet starts at 20 cents per spin, making it accessible to all, while the maximum bet value is €100 per spin, providing a chance to win significant payouts. The game has medium-high volatility, with a maximum payout of 2,500 times the bet amount, which is relatively impressive.

Graphics and Design

Hit it Hard is a well-executed mix of modern and vintage styling that immerses the players in a late millennium game-room atmosphere. The bright colors of neon lights and vintage graphics take the players back to the 90s, while a theme soundtrack accompanies them as they spin the reels, providing an engaging and entertaining gaming experience.

RTP and Overall Gaming Experience

The theoretical return to the player (RTP) in Hit it Hard is 96.3%, which is in line with the industry average. The game offers decent payouts, various bonus features, flexible betting ranges, and is enjoyable overall, making it a decent slot game for all types of players who are looking for some vintage-style fun.

Review: Hit it Hard is an online slot game produced by the software company ELK, launched in January 2020. It is a well-executed mix of modernity and vintage style and a technological tribute to the mythical Fruit Machine!

At first glance, the look of this slot machine immediately takes us back to the 90s: the game screen is an explosion of neon lights in shades of fuchsia and purple, and the graphics are also appropriately vintage.

Even if you take a look at the reels, the feeling is that you have entered a late millennium game room, with symbols borrowed from traditional Fruit Machines beloved by slot game enthusiasts. A theme soundtrack accompanies players as they spin the reels, making the gaming experience even more enjoyable and engaging.

Regarding the betting range, maximum payout, and RTP, Hit it Hard has a fairly classic game structure, with three reels and five pay lines. Its features, payouts, and winning possibilities are nothing stellar but are decently average. Hit it Hard is a slot game that can adapt to the needs of most players, thanks to its very flexible betting range, starting from a minimum bet of only 20 cents per spin, up to a reasonable bet of 100 € per maximum spin.

Even potential wins are not too bad: Hit It Hard is characterized by a medium-high volatility (4/5), which means that although the wins are not very frequent, they are of some weight. The maximum payout that players can get playing with this slot machine is 2,500 times the bet value, which is quite impressive! As for the theoretical return to the player (RTP), this is 96.3%, fairly standard, in line with most online slot games.

Hit It Hard symbols include regular and special symbols and Bonus features, as mentioned, referring to the tradition of classic Fruit Machines and including symbols that can also be found in land-based slots.

These include the number 7 in three colors: the green 7 pays up to a maximum of 10 times the bet, the blue 7 up to 25, and the red 7 up to 50 times when it appears on all reels. The BAR is also present in the same three colors as the 7, with payments ranging from 3 to 5 times the bet.

The regular symbols with lower value are represented by three fruits, watermelon, lemon, and cherry, with a value ranging from 0.5 to 1.5 times the bet. There are also a Wild symbol and a Scatter symbol, and the possibility of playing a bonus game that allows winning various prizes, including multipliers and free spins, wild spins, stacked wilds, and more.

Overall, Hit it Hard is a slot game that combines modernity and vintage style, providing an engaging gaming experience to any online gambler with decent payouts and a range of exciting features.
